text: Carlo Antonio Buffagnotti was an Italian painter of the late-Baroque, active as a painter of perspective and theatrical decorations at Bologna and Genoa about 1690. He engraved a series of architectural subjects, and decorations for the theatre, after Francesco Galli Bibiena, and others after Marcantonio Chiarini. ==References== * Category:17th-century Italian painters Category:Italian male painters Category:Genoese painters Category:Bolognese painters Category:Italian Baroque painters Category:Italian scenic designers Category:Year of birth unknown Category:Year of death unknown
title: Carlo Antonio Buffagnotti
